snippet: A man in Brooklyn fell victim to a scam, when he sold his iPad2 to a stranger in exchange for $420 in counterfeit bills.
abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column on Brooklyn man who fell victim to scam when he sold his iPad2 on Craigslist to a stranger in exchange for $420 in counterfeit bills.
lead_paragraph: A man in Brooklyn fell victim to a scam, when he sold his iPad2 to a stranger in exchange for $420 in counterfeit bills.

headline.seo: A Great Deal for a Used iPad: $420 in Counterfeit Bills
headline.main: For This Kind of Money, a Used iPad Proves to Be a Steal
headline.print_headline: For This Kind of Money, a Used iPad Proves to Be a Steal
